section.section: The entire capital and operating cost of the minimum library program for this State as a whole shall be shared as provided in this subsection.

The State shall provide:
Approximately 40 percent of the total cost of the minimum program; and
Not less than 20 percent of the cost of the minimum program in any county.
The counties participating in the program together shall provide through local taxes approximately 60 percent of the total statewide cost of the minimum program.
The State shall share in this amount.
Any county may provide an amount greater than its share under the cooperative program, but the State may not share in the excess.

text.section: Any employer Social Security contributions required by federal law for any employee in a county public library system shall remain the obligation of the employer.
